# subtype

**Instance Property**

Specifies an optional subtype that indicates the direction for the predefined motion-based transitions.

## Declaration

```swift
var subtype: CATransitionSubtype? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are shown in  [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/common-transition-subtypes]. The default is `nil`.

This property is ignored if a custom transition is specified in the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransition/filter] property.

## Transition Properties

- **type**: Specifies the predefined transition type.
title: subtype
